channel.description: Global session and authentication policies Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Links to original docs: First section in Configure a global session policy and authentication policies: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/configure-signon-policy/main/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.
